title: NBA 2K20 Digital Deluxe
description: The NBA 2K20 Digital Deluxe Edition includes 35,000 Virtual Currency, 10,000 MyTEAM Points, 10 MyCAREER Skill Boosts, MyPLAYER Clothing Capsule, 10 MyTEAM League Packs (delivered one a week), 10 MyTEAM Heat Check Packs (delivered one a week), and 1 Sapphire MyTEAM Anthony Davis Card. See MyTEAM Pack Drop Rates below.
